description.text:
I can't believe you ate both cakes! Now we don't have an offering for $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$()
 I know! We should steal some of that delicious golden $(b;summer)magical honeycomb$() from the $(b;summer)Summer Court$()!
 But bee-carefull -the pixie giggles- for those $(b;summer)Bee Knights$() patrolling the area! Don't get stung!

I hope you didn't kill those $(b;summer)Bee Knights$() or we might get in trouble with $(b;summer)Queen Titania$().
 Oh the Honey! Sweet! All mine now!
 No no no! It's for $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$(). I'll make sure he will receive our offering!

$(b;spring)-You received a gift from Prince Oberon-$()
